channel.title: Pw and Other help NEEDED!
channel.description:
I want to create a server on my linux computer, Ubuntu, it is stable, and can hold a lot of people.
Thanks to Hindrendra to help me SSH and I know how to port forward, he helped me figure out what to do with port21.
I just need help setting up an IP. and running the server/Compiling it, as you cannot download it from java.com

item.title: Pw and Other help NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @_kidz `kidz
item.description:
@_kidz wrote:

I have 30 rep…
I’m talking About UBUNTU LINUX!

I already know how to set it up on Windows, cause that shit’s for beginners.
OMG, I already tried No-Ip DUC, it don’t work for linux…not even with wine emulator…

If you use UBUNTU LINUX, not WINDOWS!
and made one tell me.

Read full topic

item.title: Pw and Other help NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

how do you have 30 rep lol???

but to get a no-ip. register on no-ip website, and download no-ip.duc… then you have to go to the webiste and add a host to your no-ip.

but for getting the server and running and compiling it is easy. just download a source from the downloads section, extract the files, then all you have to go into the files and click run. every time you change something you just compile for it to work. if it says you dont have the latest version of java or something, then you need to get a new compiler code

Read full topic
